### 3. **Built-in Test Accounts:**
- **Admin**: admin1@checkitout.com / Admin123!
- **Seller**: seller1@checkitout.com / Seller123!
- **Customer**: user1@checkitout.com / User123!

### 4. **Response DTOs Features:**
- ‚úÖ Consistent pagination format

### 5. **Advanced Features:**

**Happy Testing! üéâ**
